name: FONTCAT
author: Alex Lee

sections.description:
FontCat is one of wordpress plugin that have easly manage and add some optional settings for website font and add custom font to any site part.

Features

  • Modern Font.
  • Custom Font For All Heading Tags.
  • Inject Custom Font To any Tags You Want.
  • Advanced Custom CSS
  • Advanced Custom Font
  • 5 Unit For Font-Size; (px, pt, rem, em, inch)
  • Font Style
  • Font Weight
  • Font Color
  • Line Height
  • Word Spaing
  • Letter Spaing
  • Live Preview
  • 7/24 Support FontCat Team

Resource

  • Bulma [ https://bulma.io/ ]
  • Jquery Confirm [ https://craftpip.github.io/jquery-confirm/ ]
  • Fontawesome [ https://fontawesome.com/ ]
  • Spectrum [ https://github.com/bgrins/spectrum ]
sections.changelog:
1 [2024-06-26]

  • Realse Version 1

Bugs

  • Please send me any plugin bugs to fontcatplugin@gmail.com

short_description: Add Fonts To Your Site In easly way. Upload And Manage Custom Fonts. Upload Any Font In 3 Extension [woff, woff2, ttf]
